caption.title: The MAPK and PI3K/Akt pathways are involved into histamine-mediated promotion of KSHV lytic replication.
caption.p: The iSLK.219 cells were exposed to Dox, histamine alone or the combination for 48 h. The protein expression was detected by Western blot. Î²-Actin was used for loading controls. Representative blots from one of two independent experiments were shown.
